title: Bahrain National Stadium
text:
Bahrain National Stadium (; <a href="Arabic%20transliteration">transliterated</a>: Stād al-Bahrayn al-Watanī) is the <a href="national%20stadium">national stadium</a> of <a href="Bahrain">Bahrain</a>, located in <a href="Riffa">Riffa</a>. It can accommodate 28,900 seats and is used mostly for <a href="association%20football">football</a> matches.
It was built in 1982. The stadium was renovated in December 2012 for hosting the <a href="21st%20Arabian%20Gulf%20Cup">21st Arabian Gulf Cup</a> tournament.
